== Video Overview ==

Show how it is possible to run *some* programs designed for DOS or Windows under Ubuntu Linux. The methods here are using DOSEMU and WINE. Cedega and Crossover are mentioned but not shown/used. DOSBOX, QEMU and other emulators are NOT used or shown. They will be shown in another screencast about emulation.

== Target Audience ==

* Users who wish to run legacy DOS programs
* Users who wish to run Microsoft Windows applications

== Pre-requisites ==

* A DOS or Windows application

== Required Knowledge ==

* None

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* Basic familiarity with navigation in Ubuntu 

== Objectives ==

* Describe how to install DOSEMU and WINE
* Detail how to run DOS programs under DOSEMU
* Explain how to run Microsoft Windows applications under WINE
